title: VA - Endless Highway: The Music of The Band (2007)
description:
This is the same torrent that was uploaded to Demonoid in February 2007.


Endless Highway - The Music of The Band (2007) [FLACs, all art]

Includes:
Files by track, ripped at FLAC 8.
All artwork in jpgs at 300 d.p.i. Rotated and cropped losslessly.
Notes.txt (which is simply this included in the torrent)
Track Listing.nfo.txt
URL.txt

An excerpt from AllMusic.com:

As a rule, tribute records are problematic; there are some tunes that shine, others that are interpreted as if the performer has no idea what the original artist was about. Amazingly, that's not so on Endless Highway: The Music of The Band, despite a wider ranging roster than is usually proffered. This is also a celebration of the 30th Anniversary of Martin Scorsese's brilliant film The Last Waltz commemorating the Band's farewell concerts in San Francisco. The array here is simply dazzling. ...

The entire review can be found here:  <a href="
http://allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:rtkmikbtbbo9~T1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:rtkmikbtbbo9~T1</a>

At Amazon.com I find three versions of this CD. One, a double CD, I clearly don't have. The third is an import that isn't yet available. This one pictures the same case sticker: <a href=" http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000JMJVPY/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000JMJVPY/</a>
But shows a different track listing order. I think Amazon.com is wrong, as the tracks on my CD match AllMusic and what was found in the FreeDB database.
